content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":257872,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうか・・お前もテオマンの女だったな・・よーし、少し若いが・・入らない事はないだろう","translatedEnglishLine":"I see... You were a woman of Teoman too... Alright, you're a bit young, but I guess it won't be a problem."},{"lineNumber":257873,"originalJapaneseLine":"だーと襲いかかるが逃げられる。私　男ですよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I rushed at him, but he escaped. I'm a man, you know."},{"lineNumber":257874,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちっ、そんな気がしていたわ、くそっ","translatedEnglishLine":"Tch, I had a feeling this would happen, damn it."},{"lineNumber":257875,"originalJapaneseLine":"少しコーラと話","translatedEnglishLine":"Talked a little with Kola."},{"lineNumber":257876,"originalJapaneseLine":"　貴方はどれだけアリオスから奪っていけば気がすむのですかね。","translatedEnglishLine":"How much are you going to steal from Arios before you’re satisfied?"},{"lineNumber":257877,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ひどい人です","translatedEnglishLine":"You're a terrible person."},{"lineNumber":257878,"originalJapaneseLine":"　セシルも入れたらたった３人じゃないか","translatedEnglishLine":"Including Cecil, that makes only three people, right?"},{"lineNumber":257879,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いいえ、勇者アリオスは本来はもっと世界のキーとなる女性と多く出会っていたはずでした。","translatedEnglishLine":"No, the hero Arios originally should have met many more key women of the world."},{"lineNumber":257880,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リア、マジック、カスタムの魔女達、他にも・・勇者が会って関係を結ぶべき人達でしたが","translatedEnglishLine":"Ria, Magic, the witches of Custom, and others... people the hero was supposed to meet and form bonds with."},{"lineNumber":257881,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いや、ほんとまいりましたよ、あなたには・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Honestly, I’m really taken aback by you..."},{"lineNumber":257882,"originalJapaneseLine":"てな事を言って立ち去るコーラ","translatedEnglishLine":"Saying such things, Kola walks away."},{"lineNumber":257883,"originalJapaneseLine":"よくわからん、ま、とにかくあいつの女はやった。","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't really get it, but anyway, I got that guy's woman."},{"lineNumber":257884,"originalJapaneseLine":"次にあった時は、この事をいってショック受けさせてやる、がははは","translatedEnglishLine":"Next time we meet, I'll tell him about this and shock him, hahahaha."},{"lineNumber":257885,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t世界の説明、魔物界、人間界","translatedEnglishLine":"Explanation of the world: Monster World, Human World."},{"lineNumber":257886,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t魔軍が攻めて来た、各国が混乱している状況","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army has invaded, and every country is in turmoil."},{"lineNumber":257887,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tランス城に各国の使者が押し寄せてくる","translatedEnglishLine":"Envoys from various countries flood into Rance Castle."},{"lineNumber":257888,"originalJapaneseLine":"■ヘルマン国　シベリア雪原地帯■","translatedEnglishLine":"■ Kingdom of Helman - Siberian Snowfield Region ■"},{"lineNumber":257889,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は\"聖女の子モンスターセラクロラス\"を","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others are searching for the \"Saint Monster Girl, Seracloras\"."},{"lineNumber":257890,"originalJapaneseLine":"捜してここ\"巨大戦艦遺跡\"に来ている","translatedEnglishLine":"They have come to these 'Giant Battleship Ruins' in search of her."},{"lineNumber":257891,"originalJapaneseLine":"探索を開始して１０日が過ぎていた","translatedEnglishLine":"Ten days have passed since beginning the exploration."},{"lineNumber":257892,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ＢＹ　シィルの日記","translatedEnglishLine":"BY: Ciel's Diary."},{"lineNumber":257893,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘時割り込み、第１ターン前","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle interruption, before the first turn."},{"lineNumber":257894,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス様、モンスターです。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Rance, there are monsters."},{"lineNumber":257895,"originalJapaneseLine":"えっと、６匹もいますよ、みなさんを呼ばないと","translatedEnglishLine":"Um, there are six of them. We need to call everyone."},{"lineNumber":257896,"originalJapaneseLine":"必要無い、この程度の雑魚どもは","translatedEnglishLine":"No need. These small fry aren’t worth it."},{"lineNumber":257897,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺とお前で蹴散らしてやるぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"You and I will scatter them."},{"lineNumber":257898,"originalJapaneseLine":"はい、ランス様","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, Lord Rance."},{"lineNumber":257899,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘時割り込み、ランスとシィルのみの時","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle interruption, when there are only Rance and Ciel."},{"lineNumber":257900,"originalJapaneseLine":"ん、なんだ・・・おかしいぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm? What is this... something's strange."},{"lineNumber":257901,"originalJapaneseLine":"攻撃する際に必要なＡＰが前より増えているでは無いか","translatedEnglishLine":"The AP needed to attack has increased compared to before."},{"lineNumber":257902,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス様、同じ行動を連続で使用すると必要ＡＰが増えますよ","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Rance, using the same action consecutively raises the required AP."},{"lineNumber":257903,"originalJapaneseLine":"うまくローテションを組んでモンスターを攻撃した方がお得です","translatedEnglishLine":"It's more efficient to rotate attacks properly against the monsters."},{"lineNumber":257904,"originalJapaneseLine":"私もうまく使って下さいね。がんばります。","translatedEnglishLine":"Please make good use of me too. I'll do my best."},{"lineNumber":257905,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘時割り込み、ランスとシィルのみの時","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle interruption, when only Rance and Ciel are present."},{"lineNumber":257906,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス様、今です、チャンスです。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Rance, now’s our chance."},{"lineNumber":257907,"originalJapaneseLine":"見て下さい、今、モンスターの弱点が炎になっています。","translatedEnglishLine":"Look, the monsters' weakness is currently fire."},{"lineNumber":257908,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして私の攻撃属性は炎なので私が攻撃するとダメージボーナスが付きますよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"And since my attack attribute is fire, if I attack, we get a damage bonus."},{"lineNumber":257909,"originalJapaneseLine":"うむ、そうだな、分かっていたぞ。数少ないお前の出番だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Indeed, I knew that. This is one of your rare moments to shine."},{"lineNumber":257910,"originalJapaneseLine":"で、俺様の属性のチャンスはいつ来るのだ。俺様の属性マークは・・・なんだこれ？","translatedEnglishLine":"So, when will my attribute chance come? My attribute mark is... what is this?"},{"lineNumber":257911,"originalJapaneseLine":"えっと・・無属性です、すごく珍しいです。","translatedEnglishLine":"Um... it's non-attribute. That's very rare."},{"lineNumber":257912,"originalJapaneseLine":"えっと・・これが弱点になる敵さんは・・その・・居るのかな？","translatedEnglishLine":"Um... are there even enemies weak to that? I'm not sure..."},{"lineNumber":257913,"originalJapaneseLine":"なにー","translatedEnglishLine":"What—"},{"lineNumber":257914,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘時割り込み、ランス、シィル、ロッキー、ホルス達","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle interruption: Rance, Ciel, Rocky, Horus and others."},{"lineNumber":257915,"originalJapaneseLine":"ロッキー、がんばるだす。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rocky: I'll do my best."},{"lineNumber":257916,"originalJapaneseLine":"うざい、近寄るな、あっちいってろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Annoying, stay away, go over there."},{"lineNumber":257917,"originalJapaneseLine":"こらこら、ランス君、仲間を無下に扱う物ではないぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, Rance-kun, you shouldn't treat your comrades so harshly."},{"lineNumber":257918,"originalJapaneseLine":"一緒に力を合わせて戦うとよい","translatedEnglishLine":"You should fight together, combining your strength."},{"lineNumber":257919,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかしな、こいつらが増えてもやるべき事は無いぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"But even if they increase in number, there’s nothing more to do."},{"lineNumber":257920,"originalJapaneseLine":"貴重なＡＰは全て俺様が使用するからな。","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll be using all the precious AP, after all."},{"lineNumber":257921,"originalJapaneseLine":"彼らに先に攻撃させてコンボを増やしてからランス君が攻撃すれば","translatedEnglishLine":"If you let them attack first to increase combos, then Rance-kun attacks,"},{"lineNumber":257922,"originalJapaneseLine":"より効果的ではあるだろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"it would probably be more effective."},{"lineNumber":257923,"originalJapaneseLine":"ま、無いよりはマシか","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, it’s better than nothing, I guess."},{"lineNumber":257924,"originalJapaneseLine":"仲間が合流","translatedEnglishLine":"Comrades join up."},{"lineNumber":257925,"originalJapaneseLine":"ロッキー、ホルス達、サテラ、ベゼルアイ","translatedEnglishLine":"Rocky, Horus and others, Satela, Bezelai."},{"lineNumber":257926,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの目的","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance's objectives."},{"lineNumber":257927,"originalJapaneseLine":"　・４体の聖女の子モンスターを犯す","translatedEnglishLine":"- To violate four saint monster girls."},{"lineNumber":257928,"originalJapaneseLine":"　・この遺跡には\"セラクロラス\"が居る","translatedEnglishLine":"- This ruin has 'Seracloras'."},{"lineNumber":257929,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":257930,"originalJapaneseLine":"エロい気分になったので奴隷シィルを抱く","translatedEnglishLine":"Feeling lustful, he embraces his slave Ciel."},{"lineNumber":257931,"originalJapaneseLine":"３人のホルス達","translatedEnglishLine":"Three Horus comrades."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか・・お前もテオマンの女だったな・・よーし、少し若いが・・入らない事はないだろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see... You were a woman of Teoman too... Alright, you're a bit young, but I guess it won't be a problem.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だーと襲いかかるが逃げられる。私　男ですよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I rushed at him, but he escaped. I'm a man, you know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちっ、そんな気がしていたわ、くそっ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tch, I had a feeling this would happen, damn it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少しコーラと話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Talked a little with Kola.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴方はどれだけアリオスから奪っていけば気がすむのですかね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How much are you going to steal from Arios before you’re satisfied?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひどい人です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're a terrible person.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルも入れたらたった３人じゃないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Including Cecil, that makes only three people, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいえ、勇者アリオスは本来はもっと世界のキーとなる女性と多く出会っていたはずでした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, the hero Arios originally should have met many more key women of the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア、マジック、カスタムの魔女達、他にも・・勇者が会って関係を結ぶべき人達でしたが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ria, Magic, the witches of Custom, and others... people the hero was supposed to meet and form bonds with.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、ほんとまいりましたよ、あなたには・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Honestly, I’m really taken aback by you...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てな事を言って立ち去るコーラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saying such things, Kola walks away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よくわからん、ま、とにかくあいつの女はやった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't really get it, but anyway, I got that guy's woman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次にあった時は、この事をいってショック受けさせてやる、がははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Next time we meet, I'll tell him about this and shock him, hahahaha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の説明、魔物界、人間界
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation of the world: Monster World, Human World.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍が攻めて来た、各国が混乱している状況
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army has invaded, and every country is in turmoil.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城に各国の使者が押し寄せてくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Envoys from various countries flood into Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ■ヘルマン国　シベリア雪原地帯■
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ■ Kingdom of Helman - Siberian Snowfield Region ■

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は"聖女の子モンスターセラクロラス"を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others are searching for the "Saint Monster Girl, Seracloras".

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 捜してここ"巨大戦艦遺跡"に来ている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They have come to these 'Giant Battleship Ruins' in search of her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 探索を開始して１０日が過ぎていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ten days have passed since beginning the exploration.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＢＹ　シィルの日記
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: BY: Ciel's Diary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘時割り込み、第１ターン前
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle interruption, before the first turn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、モンスターです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance, there are monsters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっと、６匹もいますよ、みなさんを呼ばないと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Um, there are six of them. We need to call everyone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必要無い、この程度の雑魚どもは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No need. These small fry aren’t worth it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺とお前で蹴散らしてやるぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You and I will scatter them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、ランス様
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, Lord Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘時割り込み、ランスとシィルのみの時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle interruption, when there are only Rance and Ciel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ん、なんだ・・・おかしいぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm? What is this... something's strange.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻撃する際に必要なＡＰが前より増えているでは無いか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The AP needed to attack has increased compared to before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、同じ行動を連続で使用すると必要ＡＰが増えますよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance, using the same action consecutively raises the required AP.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うまくローテションを組んでモンスターを攻撃した方がお得です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's more efficient to rotate attacks properly against the monsters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私もうまく使って下さいね。がんばります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please make good use of me too. I'll do my best.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘時割り込み、ランスとシィルのみの時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle interruption, when only Rance and Ciel are present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、今です、チャンスです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance, now’s our chance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見て下さい、今、モンスターの弱点が炎になっています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Look, the monsters' weakness is currently fire.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして私の攻撃属性は炎なので私が攻撃するとダメージボーナスが付きますよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And since my attack attribute is fire, if I attack, we get a damage bonus.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむ、そうだな、分かっていたぞ。数少ないお前の出番だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Indeed, I knew that. This is one of your rare moments to shine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: で、俺様の属性のチャンスはいつ来るのだ。俺様の属性マークは・・・なんだこれ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, when will my attribute chance come? My attribute mark is... what is this?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっと・・無属性です、すごく珍しいです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Um... it's non-attribute. That's very rare.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっと・・これが弱点になる敵さんは・・その・・居るのかな？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Um... are there even enemies weak to that? I'm not sure...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘時割り込み、ランス、シィル、ロッキー、ホルス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle interruption: Rance, Ciel, Rocky, Horus and others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロッキー、がんばるだす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rocky: I'll do my best.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うざい、近寄るな、あっちいってろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Annoying, stay away, go over there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こらこら、ランス君、仲間を無下に扱う物ではないぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, Rance-kun, you shouldn't treat your comrades so harshly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一緒に力を合わせて戦うとよい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You should fight together, combining your strength.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかしな、こいつらが増えてもやるべき事は無いぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But even if they increase in number, there’s nothing more to do.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴重なＡＰは全て俺様が使用するからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll be using all the precious AP, after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼らに先に攻撃させてコンボを増やしてからランス君が攻撃すれば
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you let them attack first to increase combos, then Rance-kun attacks,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: より効果的ではあるだろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it would probably be more effective.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、無いよりはマシか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, it’s better than nothing, I guess.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仲間が合流
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Comrades join up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロッキー、ホルス達、サテラ、ベゼルアイ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rocky, Horus and others, Satela, Bezelai.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの目的
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance's objectives.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・４体の聖女の子モンスターを犯す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - To violate four saint monster girls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・この遺跡には"セラクロラス"が居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - This ruin has 'Seracloras'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エロい気分になったので奴隷シィルを抱く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Feeling lustful, he embraces his slave Ciel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３人のホルス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Three Horus comrades.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか・・お前もテオマンの女だったな・・よーし、少し若いが・・入らない事はないだろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see... You were a woman of Teoman too... Alright, you're a bit young, but I guess it won't be a problem.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だーと襲いかかるが逃げられる。私　男ですよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I rushed at him, but he escaped. I'm a man, you know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちっ、そんな気がしていたわ、くそっ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tch, I had a feeling this would happen, damn it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少しコーラと話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Talked a little with Kola.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴方はどれだけアリオスから奪っていけば気がすむのですかね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How much are you going to steal from Arios before you’re satisfied?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひどい人です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're a terrible person.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルも入れたらたった３人じゃないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Including Cecil, that makes only three people, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいえ、勇者アリオスは本来はもっと世界のキーとなる女性と多く出会っていたはずでした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, the hero Arios originally should have met many more key women of the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア、マジック、カスタムの魔女達、他にも・・勇者が会って関係を結ぶべき人達でしたが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ria, Magic, the witches of Custom, and others... people the hero was supposed to meet and form bonds with.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、ほんとまいりましたよ、あなたには・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Honestly, I’m really taken aback by you...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てな事を言って立ち去るコーラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saying such things, Kola walks away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よくわからん、ま、とにかくあいつの女はやった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't really get it, but anyway, I got that guy's woman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次にあった時は、この事をいってショック受けさせてやる、がははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Next time we meet, I'll tell him about this and shock him, hahahaha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の説明、魔物界、人間界
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation of the world: Monster World, Human World.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍が攻めて来た、各国が混乱している状況
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army has invaded, and every country is in turmoil.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城に各国の使者が押し寄せてくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Envoys from various countries flood into Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ■ヘルマン国　シベリア雪原地帯■
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ■ Kingdom of Helman - Siberian Snowfield Region ■

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は"聖女の子モンスターセラクロラス"を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others are searching for the "Saint Monster Girl, Seracloras".

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 捜してここ"巨大戦艦遺跡"に来ている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They have come to these 'Giant Battleship Ruins' in search of her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 探索を開始して１０日が過ぎていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ten days have passed since beginning the exploration.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＢＹ　シィルの日記
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: BY: Ciel's Diary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘時割り込み、第１ターン前
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle interruption, before the first turn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、モンスターです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance, there are monsters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっと、６匹もいますよ、みなさんを呼ばないと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Um, there are six of them. We need to call everyone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必要無い、この程度の雑魚どもは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No need. These small fry aren’t worth it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺とお前で蹴散らしてやるぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You and I will scatter them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、ランス様
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, Lord Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘時割り込み、ランスとシィルのみの時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle interruption, when there are only Rance and Ciel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ん、なんだ・・・おかしいぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm? What is this... something's strange.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻撃する際に必要なＡＰが前より増えているでは無いか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The AP needed to attack has increased compared to before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、同じ行動を連続で使用すると必要ＡＰが増えますよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance, using the same action consecutively raises the required AP.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うまくローテションを組んでモンスターを攻撃した方がお得です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's more efficient to rotate attacks properly against the monsters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私もうまく使って下さいね。がんばります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please make good use of me too. I'll do my best.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘時割り込み、ランスとシィルのみの時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle interruption, when only Rance and Ciel are present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、今です、チャンスです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance, now’s our chance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見て下さい、今、モンスターの弱点が炎になっています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Look, the monsters' weakness is currently fire.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして私の攻撃属性は炎なので私が攻撃するとダメージボーナスが付きますよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And since my attack attribute is fire, if I attack, we get a damage bonus.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむ、そうだな、分かっていたぞ。数少ないお前の出番だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Indeed, I knew that. This is one of your rare moments to shine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: で、俺様の属性のチャンスはいつ来るのだ。俺様の属性マークは・・・なんだこれ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, when will my attribute chance come? My attribute mark is... what is this?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっと・・無属性です、すごく珍しいです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Um... it's non-attribute. That's very rare.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっと・・これが弱点になる敵さんは・・その・・居るのかな？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Um... are there even enemies weak to that? I'm not sure...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘時割り込み、ランス、シィル、ロッキー、ホルス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle interruption: Rance, Ciel, Rocky, Horus and others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロッキー、がんばるだす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rocky: I'll do my best.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うざい、近寄るな、あっちいってろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Annoying, stay away, go over there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こらこら、ランス君、仲間を無下に扱う物ではないぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, Rance-kun, you shouldn't treat your comrades so harshly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一緒に力を合わせて戦うとよい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You should fight together, combining your strength.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかしな、こいつらが増えてもやるべき事は無いぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But even if they increase in number, there’s nothing more to do.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴重なＡＰは全て俺様が使用するからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll be using all the precious AP, after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼らに先に攻撃させてコンボを増やしてからランス君が攻撃すれば
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you let them attack first to increase combos, then Rance-kun attacks,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: より効果的ではあるだろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it would probably be more effective.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、無いよりはマシか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, it’s better than nothing, I guess.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仲間が合流
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Comrades join up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロッキー、ホルス達、サテラ、ベゼルアイ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rocky, Horus and others, Satela, Bezelai.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの目的
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance's objectives.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・４体の聖女の子モンスターを犯す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - To violate four saint monster girls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・この遺跡には"セラクロラス"が居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - This ruin has 'Seracloras'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エロい気分になったので奴隷シィルを抱く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Feeling lustful, he embraces his slave Ciel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３人のホルス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Three Horus comrades.
